text: Without Pity () is a 1948 Italian crime drama movie directed by Alberto Lattuada and starring Carla Del Poggio, John Kitzmiller, Giulietta Masina, Folco Lulli. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1948 crime drama movies Category:Italian crime movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Alberto Lattuada
title: Without Pity (1948 movie)
